projects.title: tools match
projects.content: ToolMatch is a web application developed as a final group project during the Henry Full Stack Developer bootcamp. The application follows Scrum methodology and GitHub Flow. It is designed to facilitate the buying, selling, and renting of used tools within Latin American neighborhoods. ToolMatch utilizes technologies such as Prisma, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and PostgreSQL. Additionally, it includes additional features such as Google authentication, payment gateways with Mercado Pago, and notifications with Nodemailer. With all these functionalities, ToolMatch provides a secure, convenient, and comprehensive platform for tool exchange among neighbors in Latin American communities.

projects.title: pokemon app
projects.content: The React-based web application functions as a Pokédex, allowing users to search, filter, and view details of Pokémon. It uses the Pokémon API to display existing information and allows the creation of new Pokémon in a PostgreSQL database. Additionally, it provides sorting functions by alphabetical order, attack, and creation, as well as the ability to view detailed information for each Pokémon, such as type, abilities, statistics, and moves. In summary, it provides a complete Pokédex experience for Pokémon fans.

projects.title: entertainment web app
projects.content: This project is a frontend challenge called 'Entertainment Web App' from Frontend Mentor. The goal is to create a web application that closely resembles the provided design using React and Sass. Users should be able to navigate between different pages, add/remove favorites, and search for shows. The application should be responsive and display hover states for interactive elements. In this case, the app is specifically designed for browsing movies and TV series.

aboutme.title: about me
aboutme.content: Hi, I'm Jeffer Steven, a frontend-focused web developer with expertise in design and software development. My tech stacks include ReactJs, NextJs, Redux, JavaScript, TypeScript, Html, Css, Sass, Tailwind, Postgresql, Sequelize, express, and nodejs. Additionally, I have proficiency in design tools such as Figma, Adobe Illustrator, and Adobe Photoshop. I have completed various projects in my spare time, some of which are available in my portfolio. I'm actively seeking exciting and challenging opportunities to continue growing as a web developer.
